txt.en: Náth has asked you to find the wolf den called Draurákh west of Fellgát and defeat the wolves within.\n\nYou should defeat wolves in Draurákh, including the pack leader, Snárfrek.

'Did you clear out those wolves, [placeholder]? Great work! I was a little worried we might need to wait until our reinforcements arrived to deal with those beasts, but I knew someone of your skill would have no trouble!\n\n'Well, perhaps I did not know it. But I suspected!'

'I know you are eager to venture higher up the mountain-side with Hórin, but I have one last thing to ask you. Molkha has reported that she found a den of wolves near the drake feeding grounds. In such a location she will need to watch both the skies above and the ground underfoot, and that has me worried!\n\n'Can you clear that wolf-den and ensure, for now, that she has only one danger to worry about? I would really appreciate it.'
You have cleared the wolf pack from Draurákh.\n\nYou should talk to Náth in Fellgát.
Náth has asked you to clear a den of wolves west of Fellgát.
